name: Moonlit District
summary: Moonlit District is a Vanilla-Compatible episode for Doom 2 featuring textures from Perdition's gate. The WAD was a speed-map project made over the course of 4 days. It was tested in Chocolate Doom, Crispy Doom, and DSDA-Doom (complevel 2). Difficulties are implemented. Mouselook, jumping, and crouching should be disabled if you're playing on a port with those features.
